title: A Massive NBA Change
description:
Pablo Torre, Sarah Spain and Charles McDonald debate how they think the rest of LeBron’s tenure in LA will play out and react to the news that New York City plans to lift the vaccine mandate and allow Kyrie to play in home games.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
